Package: unacloud

[Groovy] Class DeploymentService

    • unacloud.DeploymentService

    • This service contains all methods to manage deployment: create and delete cluster. This class connects with database using hibernate

      Authors:
      CesarF

      • Method Detail

        • java.lang.Object addInstances(DeployedImage image, User user, long time, ImageRequestOptions request)

          Add new instances in ImageRequestOptions array to a DeployedImage

          Parameters:
          image - to adding instances
          user - who request add instances
          time - for execution
          requests - group of deployment properties for executions

        • java.lang.Object createCopy(VirtualMachineExecution execution, User user, java.lang.String newName)

          Create a task to make a copy from a current execution

          throws:
          Exception
          Parameters:
          execution - to create a copy from its image
          user - user owner
          newName - name for image copy

        • java.lang.Object deploy(Cluster cluster, User user, long time, ImageRequestOptions[] requests)

          Deploys a new cluster which virtual machines could be heterogeneous for the same image

          throws:
          Exception if any of the deployment processes fails
          Parameters:
          cluster - cluster to be deployed
          user - owner of the deployment
          time - execution time in millisecond
          options - group of deployment properties for each image
          Returns:
          deploy created deployment entity

        • java.lang.Object getActiveDeployments(User user)

          Return the list of active deployments that owner is different from parameter user

          Parameters:
          user - owner to filter list
          Returns:
          list of deployments

        • java.lang.Object stopVirtualMachineExecutions(java.util.List<VirtualMachineExecution> executions, User requester)

          Create a task to stop virtual machines executions in list If state is FAILED changes to FINISHED else to FINISHING

          Parameters:
          executions
          user - that request stop executions
